name: Empire Defense War
description:
Welcome to old age of war. This game is one of the best way of having fun with old age strategy base war. Think about the battle ground, have sharp eyes and take best decisions to defeat the enemy in this kings game of castle. Most brave army totally depends upon your strategies to win the war in this animal attack game. Your strategy of placement of soldiers will as, when to place and where to place your hidden brawl stars like archers and sword experts. The best strategy is key to victory in this animal attack castle defense game.

In this game the castle is attacked by multiple animals. Animals like wolf, elephants have attacked the castle. Place soldiers against attack with the best strategy and hunt these wild animals to save your castle. Player will have 4 different type of army soldiers. And also have a specific budget. This budget will be used to unlock and place soldiers at different spots. Labor will be here to increase your budget. Defense tower is also here for help.

All characters are upgrade-able. Upgrade them and have best time pass experience ever.
